title: AE脚本：MG路径生长图形动画 Ouroboros 2.01 + 使用教程
author: 大众脸
content: 该脚本可在AE的单个路径上创建多个笔画，适合制作MG图形动画，带脚本使用视频教程，适用于Win/Mac系统下AE CS6 - CC 2017 ，介绍了脚本安装及使用方法。

other.脚本简介英文: With Ouroboros you can create multiple strokes on one single path in After Effects. This can quickly create some really detailed looking stroke effects in your scene. I teamed up with Remco Janssen ( who created Expressionist ) to create this new version. http://aescripts.com/ouroboros-2/
